General.Name: Apartment Investment and Management Co
General.Description: Aimco is a diversified real estate company primarily focused on value add and opportunistic investments, targeting the U.S. multifamily sector. Aimco's mission is to make real estate investments where outcomes are enhanced through our human capital so that substantial value is created for investors, teammates, and the communities in which we operate. Aimco is traded on the New York Stock Exchange as AIV.
General.Address: 4582 South Ulster Street, Denver, CO, United States, 80237-2632
